products.title: Red Rose Bouquet
products.description: Nothing speaks of love so much as a bouquet of beautiful red roses. Arranged with seeded eucalyptus in a classic glass vase, this bouquet is a gift to her heart from yours.

products.title: 4 Red Roses
products.description: 4 red roses arranged in a glass vase with added greenery and baby's breath.

products.title: One Dozen Red Roses
products.description: One dozen red roses are arranged with delicate white baby's breath in a clear glass vase. This romantic gift of 12 red roses is perfect for celebrating your love.

products.title: Contemporary White Roses
products.description: Modern glass cube vase arrangement with six beautiful white roses in a bed of white waxflower and variegated pitt. A lovely, contemporary display of white roses that will perfectly express your sentiments of sympathy and support.

products.title: Lucky In Lavender Roses
products.description: Fall in love with these stunning purple roses! Presented in a clear cube vase encased with delicate purple ribbon. Simply captivating!

products.title: Six Pink Roses and Balloon
products.description: 1/2 Dozen Pink Roses with Balloon. Precious bouquet of 6 pink roses, professionally arranged in a clear glass vase with baby's breath, foliage and matching bow PLUS a festive mylar birthday balloon. Celebrate!

products.title: Orange Lily Bouquet
products.description: Freshly wrapped bouquet of orange lilies with purple Statice, tied with a matching orange bow. A simple yet captivating bouquet for any occasion.

products.title: Casablanca Lilies
products.description: Demonstrate your thoughts of sympathy and condolence with this angelic vase arrangement of all-white Casablanca lilies.

products.title: Light In Your Honour Bouquet
products.description: Light In Your Honour Bouquet is a beautifully bright arrangement bursting with elegant fragrance to convey your deepest sympathies for the loss of their loved one. A stunning bouquet of gorgeous Oriental lilies are accented with lush greens and seated in a clear glass vase to create a bouquet that is serenely sophisticated, offering comfort and peace in their time of need.

products.title: White Peruvian Lilies
products.description: Splendid vase arrangement of white alstroemerias (also called Peruvian Lilies) with subtle accenting greens and matching white satin bow

products.title: 12 White Carnations
products.description: Give this affordable and thoughtful gift of 12 white carnations arranged in a glass vase with baby's breath and white satin bow.

products.title: 6 White Carnations
products.description: Let them know they are in your thoughts and prayers with this simple, affordable vase arrangement. Featuring six white carnations with baby's breath, greens and matching white bow.

products.title: One Dozen Yellow Carnations
products.description: Beautiful floral arrangement of one dozen yellow carnations arranged with baby's breath and greenery and tied with a matching white bow.

products.title: Six Yellow Carnations
products.description: Affordable, long lasting arrangement of six yellow carnations in a glass vase with added baby's breath and matching bow.

products.title: Pretty Carnations
products.description: Say thank you with this long-lasting vase arrangement of six pink and six white carnations with baby's breath, presented with a matching bow.

products.title: Twelve Pink Carnations
products.description: One dozen long lasting and popular pink carnations with added baby's breath and greens, arranged in a glass vase with matching pink bow.

products.title: Teleflora's Pink Notion Bouquet
products.description: Pink carnations can say whatever the occasion calls for in such a pretty way. A lovely mix of 6 delicate blooms and rich greens, combine expertly to convey your best wishes.

products.title: Sympathies
products.description: A pretty assortment of white and/or cream blooms rests in a clear glass bowl vase. Flowers include roses, carnations, alstroemeria and waxflower, plus complementary greenery.

products.title: Always True Bouquet
products.description: Bouquet blossoms with love's tender message. Rich red roses and carnations are accented with fuchsia mini carnations and lush greens arranged to perfection in a classic clear glass vase to create an exceptional way to convey your heart's most intimate wishes.

products.title: For Your Loss
products.description: A simple expression of your sympathies is reflected in this glass vase arrangement of white lilies with white daisies and greenery. An affordable and thoughtful gesture at a time of loss.

products.title: Teleflora's Peaceful White Lilies
products.description: These gorgeous white lilies are so classically elegant, they're sure to provide an extra touch of beauty and serenity right when they're needed most. A tasteful arrangement suitable for the family home or funeral home. Gorgeous flowers such as white lilies, carnations and miniature carnations mix with vibrant greens in a large basket.

products.title: Pastel Passion
products.description: A soft and delicate arrangement of beautiful yellow lilies, yellow daisies, purple statice and more in a stunning lavender cube. Perfect for any home or office.

products.title: Favour
products.description: Demonstrate your affection and best wishes with this pretty handled basket of pink and white flowers, including pink roses, miniature pink carnations, alstroemerias and delicate baby's breath.

products.title: Remember
products.description: Remember them with this contemporary cube vase of white and cream flowers. Our Canada Flowers design features white lilies with white alstroemerias, white stock or snapdragons and white or cream roses.

products.title: Blissful Season
products.description: A soft and delicate arrangement in a ceramic container of light pink lilies, soft pink carnations, white daisies and more!

products.title: Teleflora's Full Of Love Bouquet
products.description: Spring into pink! Delicate roses, tulips and carnations fill a graceful vase with a cheerful expression of your love. It's affection perfection! Includes pink roses, tulips, carnations and waxflower, accented with fresh pitta negra and variegated pittosporum. Delivered in a lovely glass vase.

cart.title: 4 Red Roses
cart.description: 4 red roses arranged in a glass vase with added greenery and baby's breath.

cart.title: Sympathies
cart.description: A pretty assortment of white and/or cream blooms rests in a clear glass bowl vase. Flowers include roses, carnations, alstroemeria and waxflower, plus complementary greenery.
